TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CurrencyManager extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase

summary.span: 管理 物件的清單。

span.span: Manages a list of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別。The derives from the class. 使用來傳回或。Use the to return either a or a . 傳回的實際物件取決於資料來源和資料成員傳遞給屬性。The actual object returned depends on the data source and data member passed to the property of the . 如果物件可以傳回的單一屬性 （而不是物件的清單） 的資料來源，型別會。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the type will be a . 例如，如果您指定做為資料來源，會傳回。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a will be returned. 如果相反地，資料來源是該物件會實作， ，或介面，會傳回。If, on the other hand, the data source is an object that implements the , , or interface, a will be returned. 屬性會傳回目前的項目基礎清單中。The property returns the current item in the underlying list. 若要變更目前的項目，設定屬性設為新值。To change the current item, set the property to a new value. 值必須大於 0，且必須是小於值屬性。The value must be greater than 0 and must be less than the value of the property. 如果基礎資料來源實作介面，而屬性設定為`true`，您可以使用方法。If the underlying data source implements the interface, and the property is set to `true`, you can use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例繫結控制項中的資料行，取得繫結，並設定其位置。The following code example binds a control to a column in a , gets the for the binding, and sets its position. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 將新的項目加入基礎清單中。

span.span: Adds a new item to the underlying list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當資料來源實作時，才支援這個方法介面和資料來源允許加入資料列 (是`true`)。This method is supported only if the data source implements the interface and the data source allows adding rows ( is `true`). > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的設計目的是複雜繫結控制項，例如控制項，將新的項目加入清單。This property was designed to allow complex-bound controls, such as the control, to add new items to list. 您通常會使用這個屬性只有在您要建立您自己的控制項，其中包含當。You typically use this property only if you are creating your own control that incorporates the . 若要新增的項目，如果資料來源，否則，使用方法類別。Otherwise, to add items if the data source is a , use the method of the class. 如果資料來源，使用方法新增至資料列。If the data source is a , use the method and add the row to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將新的項目加入至清單方法。The following code example adds a new item to the list with the method. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.AddNew Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 基礎資料來源並未實作 ，或者因為使用者已嘗試將資料列加入至唯讀或固定大小的 ，所以資料來源已擲回例外狀況。

span.span: The underlying data source does not implement , or the data source has thrown an exception because the user has attempted to add a row to a read-only or fixed-size .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CancelCurrentEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 取消目前的編輯作業。

span.span: Cancels the current edit operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當資料來源所包含的物件實作時，才支援這個方法介面。This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the interface. 如果資料來源中所包含的物件不會實作介面，對資料所做的變更不會被捨棄。If the objects contained within the data source do not implement the interface, changes made to the data will not be discarded. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設計來複雜資料繫結控制項，例如控制項，來取消編輯。This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the control, to cancel edits. 例如，當使用者按 ESC 鍵時，才上呼叫方法如。For example, when the user presses the ESC key, the method is called on the for the . 除非您要建立的控制項，需要相同的功能，您不應該使用這個方法。Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用當使用者按下 ESC 鍵。The following code example uses the when the user presses the ESC key. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 如果沒有任何清單，或者清單是空白的，便擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Throws an exception if there is no list, or the list is empty.

exception.span: 如果沒有任何清單，或者清單是空白的。

span.span: There is no list, or the list is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得清單中的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the list.
The number of items in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 count 屬性來決定何時到達清單結尾。Use the count property to determine when the end of a list has been reached. 因為維護 0 為基底的陣列項目清單的結尾一律為減一。Because the maintains a 0-based array of items, the end of the list is always minus one. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例逐一查看清單直到最後一個項目，取決於屬性為止。The following code example iterates through the list until the final item, determined by the property, is reached. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得清單中的目前項目。

span.span: Gets the current item in the list.
A list item of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得目前的項目，您必須知道其資料類型才能正確地將它轉換。In order to get the current item, you must know its data type in order to cast it correctly. 例如，如果資料來源或是，您必須轉換為目前的項目物件。For example, if the data source is a or , you must cast the current item as a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性，以列印`ContactName`欄位清單中目前的項目。The following code example uses the property to print the `ContactName` field for the current item in the list. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemChanged As ItemChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於目前項目變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the current item has been altered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者呼叫時，事件就會發生或方法。The event will occur when the user calls the or method. 只有當項目本身已變更以某種方式發生的事件。The event occurs only when the item itself has been changed in some manner. 例如，如果項目的值從 10 變更為 42，就會發生的事件。For example, if the value of an item is changed from 10 to 42, the event will occur. 這不應該混淆與事件項目已變更的新項目。This should not be confused with the event where the item has been changed to a new item. 如果基礎資料變更，也會發生此事件。The event will also occur if the underlying data changes. 例如，如果您變更的值，則事件就會發生。For example, if you change the value of a , the event will occur. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要建立您自己使用的控制項，您應該使用而不是事件。If you are creating your own control that uses the , you should use the instead of the event. 屬性可讓您判斷已發生的動作類型。The property of the enables you to determine the type of action that has occurred. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將事件處理常式和事件。The following code example adds event handlers for the and events. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ListChanged As ListChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於清單變更或清單項目變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件所擲回類別使用下列方法進行變更的項目時， ，和。The event is thrown by the class when changes to an item are made using methods such as , , and . 如果它會實作直接編輯資料來源時也會發生此事件介面。This event can also occur when the data source is edited directly if it implements the interface. 相關聯`OnListChanged`方法是在這個類別的私用方法。The associated `OnListChanged` method is a private method in this class. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#192](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#192)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#192](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#192)]

summary.span: 指定清單中 的目前位置。

span.span: Specifies the current position of the in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值屬性大於 0，欄位是一個介於 0 和減 1。If the value of the property is greater than 0, the field is a number between 0 and minus 1. 如果為 0，為-1。If is 0, is -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MetaDataChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 的中繼資料 (Metadata) 變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the metadata of the has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼資料組成的基礎結構描述。The metadata of the consists of the schema of the underlying . 該結構描述已變更時引發事件。The event is raised when that schema has changed. 例如，就會引發事件時以程式設計方式加入。For example, the event is raised when a is programmatically added to a . 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#193](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#193)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#193](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#193)]

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定您位於清單中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position you are at within the list.

value.span: 數字，介於 0 和 減 1。

span.span: A number between 0 and minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有一個重要的特性類別是屬性。An important property of the class is the property. 在清單中的項目，您可以檢視整個清單只有一個項目。In a list of items, you can view only one item out of the entire list. 若要判斷哪一個項目檢視，請設定至 0 （清單開頭） 之間的數字和減 1 （清單結尾）。To determine which item is viewed, set the to a number between 0 (the beginning of the list) and minus 1 (the end of the list). 因此，貨幣或在清單中，所有的控制項繫結至相同的位置會決定。Therefore, the determines the currency, or place in the list, of all controls bound to the same . 例如，假設名為"FirstName"和"LastName"的兩個資料行所組成的清單。For example, imagine a list consisting of two columns called "FirstName" and "LastName". 兩個控制項繫結至相同的清單，第一個控制項繫結至第一個資料行，第二個控制項繫結至第二個資料行。Two controls are bound to the same list; the first control is bound to the first column, and the second control is bound to the second column. 當的常見設為第三個位置中，兩個控制項顯示清單中該位置的適當值。When the of the common is set to the third position, both controls display the appropriate values for that position in the list. 換句話說，如果三個位置的項目是由名字"John"和"Smith"的最後一個名稱所組成，繫結的控制項將會顯示"John"和"Smith"。In other words, if the item at position three consists of the first name "John" and the last name "Smith", the bound controls will display "John" and "Smith". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性，以允許瀏覽清單。The following code examples use the property to allow navigation through a list. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 強制重新填入資料繫結清單。

span.span: Forces a repopulation of the data-bound list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法時的資料來源不支援通知，當變更時 (例如，如果它是)。Use the method when the data source does not support notification when it is changed (for example, if it is an ). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的陣列，並繫結至控制，然後變更一個值。The following code example creates an array and binds it to a control, and then changes one value. 方法可以呼叫以更新顯示的值控制項。The method can be called to update the value displayed by the control. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: index

summary.span: 移除在指定索引處的項目。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的設計目的是複雜的控制項，例如控制項，從清單移除項目。The method was designed to allow complex controls, such as the control, to remove items from the list. 您不應該使用這個方法確實移除項目。You should not use this method to actually remove items. 請改用方法的類別以刪除項目。Instead, use the method of the class to delete items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法在清單中移除位於位置 0 的項目。The following code example uses the method to remove the item at position 0 in the list. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 繼續資料繫結。

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允許暫時暫停與繼續在簡單資料繫結案例中的兩種方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of in a simple data binding scenario. 如果使用者必須能夠進行數個編輯資料欄位，驗證發生之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 比方說，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會造成錯誤的第二個欄位。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用防止變更發送到資料來源，直到呼叫，但不會防止資料來源中的變更會影響繫結的控制項。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called but does not prevent changes in the data source from affecting the bound controls. 使用複雜資料繫結，例如的控制項控制項，例如根據變更的事件其值更新為事件。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event. 呼叫這個方法不會防止這些事件發生。Calling this method will not prevent these events from occurring. 基於這個理由，並專用於簡單繫結控制項中這類。For this reason, and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as a . 或者，您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制事件，藉由設定屬性設`false`。Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SuspendBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 暫止資料繫結以防止變更更新繫結的資料來源。

span.span: Suspends data binding to prevents changes from updating the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法允許暫時暫止和繼續資料繫結中的簡單繫結案例。The and methods allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple binding scenario. 如果使用者必須進行幾個編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 比方說，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會造成錯誤的第二個欄位。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 為了避免變更套用至資料來源，直到會呼叫，但是不會實際阻止任何事件發生。 prevents changes from being applied to the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 使用複雜資料繫結，例如的控制項控制項，例如根據變更的事件，其值更新為事件。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events, such as the event. 因此，呼叫不會防止複雜繫結控制項接收更新資料來源的事件。Therefore, calling will not prevent complex-bound controls from receiving events to update the data source. 基於這個理由，並專用於簡單繫結控制項中這類控制項。For this reason, and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者，您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制事件，藉由設定屬性設`false`。Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#1)]

summary.span: 更新繫結的狀態。
